segments.text: I observe the angled view of this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sink on the right with water running steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman facing left, drying a plate attentively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open window shows a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a two-step stool, reaching into the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar is open and full inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool legs are splayed, a bit unsteady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby with arm raised, expecting a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back on the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a snapshot of routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the drain isn't working at all.
segments.speaker: PAR
